Errore durante la riapertura del problema, per favore riprova più tardi. Se il tema non è stato applicato correttamente, per favore termina e riapri l\'app manualmente. Abilita il suono di notifica Accedi con il token personale Token personale Accedi con l\'autenticazione base Se sei legato ad un\'organizzazione e non puoi visualizzarle qui per favore segui questo link qui sotto.\nhttps://help.github.com/articles/about-third-party-application-restrictions\nNB: La ragione per il quale FastHub non ha utilizzato il "Token di accesso" è dovuta al fatto che se qualcuno ha attivato la 2FA, la loro OTP potrà durare solo per un minuto, e ciò potrebbe comportare una disconnessione immediata da FastHub per via di GitHub che restituirebbe un accesso non autorizzato. If you\'d like to create a banner for yourself, make it 1280x384 or divisible, otherwise, it may get cropped.\n\nYou can add or change your banner at any time, by creating a gist described "header.fst" with a file containing a direct link to the header image.\n\nOr even simpler, just use the built-in image chooser! This PR can\'t be merged now. Projects No Projects No Cards Added by %s %s Too many differences to display. Please, view them via browser Project PLEASE READ!
• Why can\'t I see either my Private or my Public Organizations?

Open up https://github.com/settings/applications and look for FastHub, open it up, scroll down to "Organization access" and click on the "Grant" button. Alternatively you can sign in using Access Token which will ease the process.

• I have tried signing in with an Access Token and a One-Time Password (OTP) without any luck. What\'s wrong?

You can\'t sign in using Access Token and OTP all together. Due to the limited lifetime of such passwords you\'ll have to repeat a sign in procedure every few seconds.

• Why aren\'t my Private and Enterprise Repositories\' Wikis showing up?

As FastHub scraps GitHub\'s Wiki pages, the application is unable to obtain any session token which is required by Private Repositories.

• I have signed into my Enterprise account. Why can\'t I interact with anything other than my Enterprise GitHub?

Well, logically, you can\'t access anything else other than your Enterprise. FastHub tries to require as many permissions as possible, but can\'t do anything more about it in most cases, since your credentials are not on GitHub\'s server. But in some cases your GitHub account OAuth token will do the trick.

• Why am I having problems editing Issues/Pull Requests (PRs)?

If you are unable to edit Issues/PRs in a Public Organization\'s repository, please contact your Organization to grant access to FastHub. Alternatively you can sign in with an Access Token.

• I\'m having problems! / I want to suggest you some things!

Head to https://github.com/k0shk0sh/FastHub/issues/new and create a new issue for any bugs and feature requests. I really do encourage you to search for similar issues before opening a new one. Any duplicated ticket will be labeled as duplicated and closed immediately.

• How can I get a PROMO CODE?

If you are a student, you\'ll have to prove it to me. The documents listed below should be provided me via E-mail:

  • Your GitHub username;
  • Your student card and your identity card/passport (that shows your name and face to compare them!);
  • Your education start and graduation dates.

If you aren\'t a student and you can\'t afford purchasing PRO, you\'ll need to:

  • Your GitHub username;
  • Write an article about FastHub in any social media, such as Medium;
  • Prove your authorship.
FAQ Comments added successfully Clear Search History Restore Purchases Include Forks The comment is too far to paginate Too many responses \nShowing the max API allows Disable Loading Image Disable loading image while on data plan This issue will be submitted to FastHub\'s repo in GitHub Block
